step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to bring your shoulder blades further back and down. Focus on the circular motion.
Excellent! You're doing a great job squeezing your shoulder blades together. Keep up the smooth, controlled movement.
Nice work on the final repetition! Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Remember to take a deep breath in as you do this to help with breathing and lymphatic flow.
